transcription.text: Where to start with the premiere of Don’t Worry Darling. The feud between director and star? The leaked texts? Harry Styles seemingly spitting on Chris Pine? By then, Pine had already checked out after enduring co-star Styles praising the cinematic quality of ‘the movie’. All viral moments, but Pine's dead stare recalls the Sad Affleck meme and can be reused to have his mental retreat express our own, which we may need since Styles’ bumbling also somehow came off like an existential threat to cinema. Ironic, since many expected 'the movie' to be a hit that defied streaming and IP-driven blockbusters.
